Congratulations!
Youâ€™ve successfully survived all the enemy waves!
Made with love by the team at Viridino Studios.

Sound Effects

"80 CC0 RPG SFX" by rubberduck
"8 Magic Attacks" by leohpaz
"3 Heal Spells" by DoKashiteru
"2 High Quality Explosions" by Michel Baradari
"Menu sounds" by fvcalderan

Music

"Spooky Action Loop \['Hallow Quest']" by Zane Little Music
"Elevator Shaft" by tcarisland

Fonts

"MB An Old Witch" by Irina ModBlackmoon
(100% free for personal use & commercial use)
Various sounds used in the game were edited for pitch, length, and volume, or completely transformed to serve purposes different from their original use case.

Special thanks to

Ashley Gullen & Tom Gullen

for the amazing partnership.
